column4: hi every one need help here i need to know what is better the ubuntu 7 or the 8 plz any help ?
imho, 8.04 still needs a bit of work before it's as stable as 7.10.  (for me, on my laptop.  My server runs MUCH better with 8.04...and in fact, I need 8.04 for the tape drive to work)
, Broadcom : so what should install now ? the 7 or the 8 ?
if you can, why not download the live CDs for both, and then test wireless and suspend with both 7.10 and 8.04?  If neither works better, than you might as well go with 8.04
